message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to pay $120 for it, which is the maximum I'm willing to spend.

Hi Bob, I understand that $150 is a bit high for you, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $135. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product!

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $135 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $125 for the product, which is my final offer. If not, I'll have to consider buying it from John for $120

Hi Bob, I understand that $125 is still a bit above your budget, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can sell the product to you for $130. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product!

I appreciate your flexibility, but $130 is still a bit higher than I'm willing to pay. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $120 and $130, so I'll offer $125. If not, I'll have to consider buying it from John for $120
